bioconda.name: miniasm
bioconda.summary: Ultrafast de novo assembly for long noisy reads (though having no consensus step).

biocontainers.name: miniasm
biocontainers.summary: Ultrafast de novo assembler for long noisy dna sequencing reads

biotools.summary: Miniasm is a very fast OLC-based de novo assembler for noisy long reads. It takes all-vs-all read self-mappings (typically by minimap) as input and outputs an assembly graph in the GFA format.

bioschemas.name: miniasm
bioschemas.summary: Miniasm is a very fast OLC-based de novo assembler for noisy long reads. It takes all-vs-all read self-mappings (typically by minimap) as input and outputs an assembly graph in the GFA format.

galaxy.summary: Miniasm - Ultrafast de novo assembly for long noisy reads (though having no consensus step)
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Miniasm is a very fast OLC-based de novo assembler for noisy long reads. It takes all-vs-all read self-mappings (typically by minimap) as input and outputs an assembly graph in the GFA format.
